attributes.action: Rename National DNA Database as Homeland-Security Database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Necessary to address hostility to 'big-brother' & protect 'investment' of works previously undertaken; paid-for by the taxpayer & others.

Many in sensitive-posts, the ill & the deceased have a 'duty' to protect others [DNA-strings of comparable-individuals may identify the 'at-risk' living...].
